feed.title: Garmin Grafana Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.0.1
entry.content:
What's New?

  • switched to FIT file processing with fitparse module, allowing richer data collection for activities (Power, Temperature etc.) and no Timeout error for long activities.
  • Added week at a glance panel on Grafana
  • Added database backup guide on Readme
  • Added support for training readiness, hill score, VO2 max, and race prediction

New panels

What's Changed

  • Remove redundant /etc/timezone bind mount by @geeksville in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/3
  • Fix small typo in log by @ThomasCodez in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/7
  • fix typo in garmin-fetch.py by @greghinsley in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/12
  • chore: remove transformation for SpO2 from sleep intraday by @wolffshots in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/19
  • Use GF_PLUGINS_PREINSTALL for marcusolsson-hourly-heatmap-panel by @yvkszk in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/28

New Contributors

  • @geeksville made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/3
  • @ThomasCodez made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/7
  • @greghinsley made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/12
  • @wolffshots made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/19
  • @yvkszk made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/28
  • @arturgoms contributed to advanced training data functions implementation in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/17 by providing JSON data structures and function templates.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.1-beta...v0.0.1

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.0.2
entry.content:
New Features

  • Support for Influxdb and Victoriametrics were added (Experimental)
  • Documented additional ENV variables on Docker Compose and README
  • Fixed a critical Error on Sleep data fetching Thanks to @arturgoms (#43)
  • Introduced TimeZone variable on Grafana panel to ensure correct daily grouping (closing #34 and #48)
  • Grafana now automatically installs heatmap plugins (thanks to @yvkszk for #28)

What's Changed

  • Fix some typos by @j-bs in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/35
  • fix: support Chinese account close #42 by @yihong0618 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/44
  • added USER_TIMEZONE ENV variable in docker compose example.yml by @suskozaver in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/41

New Contributors

  • @j-bs made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/35
  • @yihong0618 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/44
  • @suskozaver made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/41

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.0.3
entry.content:
What's New?

  • Updated Readme with more extensive documentations.
  • Easy install script and single command installation - making it accessible to all Garmin users, irrespective of their technical skill set
  • Using UV instead of pip with requirements.txt (deprecated method) for the dependency resolution and container building, providing more precise control over this process. The package versions are now pinned (check uv.lock file) with SHA hash to ensure the project's environment consistency over time irrespective of updates on dependency packages thanks to the contribution of @Yatekii in #53
  • Added cadence panel to dashboard - there are many other metrics like power etc you can add on your own if you have them. race prediction panel and VO2 max panel is also now available in the latest release of the dashboard JSON.
  • Added device battery level panel (requires additional setup and configurations)
  • Fixed a bug on missing activities #30
  • Added versioning and tagging for container release (you can use now use specific version like thisisarpanghosh/garmin-fetch-data:v0.0.3 or ghcr.io/arpanghosh8453/garmin-fetch-data:v0.0.3)
  • Added new ghcr docker image (as docker hub is rate limited) at ghcr.io/arpanghosh8453/garmin-fetch-data:latest

What's Changed

  • doc: fix some typos by @yihong0618 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/51
  • Use uv & pyproject instead of deprecated requirements.txt by @Yatekii in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/53
  • fix: better easy install by @yihong0618 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/59
  • Updates to the readme file by @robbiedoesdata in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/58
  • s/martin/matin by @matin in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/64

New Contributors

  • @Yatekii made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/53
  • @robbiedoesdata made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/58
  • @matin made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/64

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3

entry.title: New release for Garmin Grafana: v0.1.0
entry.content:
❗Breaking Changes❗

  • The ENV variable FETCH_ADVANCED_TRAINING_DATA is deprecated. It is replaced by FETCH_SELECTION, which offers more granular control over what data you would like to fetch. Default value is set to daily_avg,sleep,steps,heartrate,stress,breathing,hrv,vo2,activity,race_prediction,body_composition and you can add one or more from the following training_readiness,hill_score,endurance_score,blood_pressure,hydration in the compose.yml file . This provides additional control what data you want to pull/re-fetch during bulk historic data update.

What's New?

  • New Month at a glance panels in the dashboard - Visualize your monthly stats at a glance

  • Added Hydration and Blood Pressure data fetching support.
  • Moved source script into a modular structure - supporting NixPackage builds thanks to @aciceri

What's Changed

  • ci: Do not run GitHub actions on fork by @yihong0618 in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/67
  • Move source into a proper module in the src directory and create script by @aciceri in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/70

New Contributors

  • @aciceri made their first contribution in https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/pull/70

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arpanghosh8453/garmin-grafana/compare/v0.0.3...v0.1.0
